body.p:
Paducah Ky March 7th/61
J W Tate Esqr.

My dear Sir, Will you please to make out a Commission, and send it to me for Oscar Somes to be a Notary Public for McCracken county -- and I will pay you the dollar when I Come up Now please attend this the very minute you get this as Mr. Mathew Cole Notary for the Commercial Bank has retired from business to die of Consumption and the Bank needs such an officer now & all the time Somes is a good state rights man & I want him to have it

Now will you do another thing, appoint Josiah Stoddard Byers under the name of J Stoddard Byers aid to the Gov. with rank of Col -- Mr. Byers is my son in law, & nephew of Genl. Albert Johnson of Utah expedition notoriety & is a gentleman of the first nature -- I spoke to the Governor about it at Frankfort and he told me to go to you, but I forgot it in the hurry of things -- Now please attend to both these things & you can command me.

I am yours Very truly
Jno M Johnson
